titleStmt.title: A plea for the vse of gospell ordinances: against the practice and opinions of certain men of these times. Unto which is added by way of an illustrious instance; a vindication of the ordinance of baptisme: against Mr. Dels booke, entituled The doctrine of baptismes. Wherein it's proved that the ordinance of baptism is of gospel institution, and by divine appointment, to continue of use in the Church, to the end of the world. / By Hen: Laurence Esq;.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Henry, 1600-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M.S. for Livewell Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Dell, William, d. 1664 Baptismōn didachē.
Annotation on Thomason copy: The "2" in the imprint date is crossed out and date altered to 1651; "Febr. 5.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
